thread.title: Raker

author: Raker
title: Raker
text: I called several diesel stores around including Dales super store, alligator performance, and Xtreme diesel. Diesel ops were the only ones to seem like they cared to answer all my questions I had. Nick was extremely helpful with the ordering and excellent customer service.They also are the best price around and all my stuff was at my house in a couple of days. I recommend diesel ops for all your diesel needs. Will do business with them for now on.
